title: Wear glasses? Apple's already expensive Vision Pro headset will cost you even more
description: Apple Vision Pro starts at $3,499 for just the headset, but if you need prescription lenses it's going to cost you even more.

title: Should AI come to your doctor's office? OpenAI's CEO thinks so
description: This healthcare provider is trying out AI-assisted 'hands-free charting' to generate notes and visit summaries -- with impressive results, at least in time savings.

title: Instagram may be getting its own AI chatbot soon. Here's what we know
description: Instagram is testing a feature, similar to Snapchat's My AI, that would let you chat with AI within the app.

title: M2 Ultra cheap? The most expensive Mac Pro is surprisingly affordable
description: Compared to the 2019 Mac Pro, the new M2 Ultra Apple Silicon workstations feel, well -- dare I say it? -- downright inexpensive.

title: Want quick access to Bing Chat on your phone? Add this handy widget
description: The Bing AI chat widget provides quick and convenient access to Microsoft's chatbot on iOS and Android. Here's how to add it to your device.

title: What is ProRes and why does Apple keep mentioning it?

description: Want to export the responses from your Bing AI conversations to use elsewhere? Here's how.
